BUY

$Petmi Tokenomics

The Petmi Coin smart contract does not have any ownership or mint function. The one billion supply of $PETMI tokens are pre-minted. The smart contract is effectively frozen and renounced.

  • Supply: 1 Billion
  • Liquidity: Million
  • Circulation: 1 Billion
  • LP: Burnt
  • Name: $Petmi
  • Network: Arbitrum
  • Tax: None
  • Slippage: 0.5%
  • 50%: Airdrop
  • 30%: LP
  • 10%: Foundation
  • 10%: Team and Marketing
@ Petmi by Pet Middleton
